Package game.gmk

Class GomokuPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.gmk.GomokuPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Player<GomokuAction>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DummyPlayer, GreedyPlayer, HumanPlayer, RandomPlayer
    public abstract class GomokuPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Player<GomokuAction>
    Describes the players of the GomokuGame game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GomokuPlayer​(int color, int[][] board, java.util.Random random)
      Specifies the class of a player, that is represented by the specified color can use the specified board, that is a copy of the game's board, and a random number generator.

                                    long[] remainingTimes)
        Description copied from interface: Player
        Returns the next action of a player.
        Specified by:
        getAction in interface Player<GomokuAction>
        Parameters:
        prevActions - list of action history that are pairs of player color and action. Contains the enemy actions for the previous round only.
        remainingTimes - the overall remaining times of the players in the game, indexed by the color of the players
        Returns:
        next action

      • getAction

        public abstract GomokuAction getAction​(GomokuAction prevAction,
                                       long[] remainingTimes)
        Returns the next action of the player.
        Parameters:
        prevAction - the last action of the enemy player or null iff no previous action available.
        remainingTimes - the overall remaining times of the players in the game
        Returns:
        the next action
